Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: The bed looks nice but it's very thin. My dog scratched a hole in it within the first week. And then proceeded to tear it apart. If your dog doesn't move around or scratch much it would probably be okay but it's not very durable.

Reviews.Title: good product; my dog likes bigger edge bumpers though.
Reviews.Author: Ken Bunzel
Reviews.Content: my dog likes big bumpers, i.e. side are too low so we had to get old bed repaired and make this one just a in-house resting place instead of his actual evening bed.

Reviews.Title: Worked fine... for a while
Reviews.Author: Jongleberry
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item in August. One set of four cameras did not work at all, so I had to go to Fry's to return those cameras and get a new one. Now half a year later, the DVR doesn't work. Swann is making returning/replacing the DVR a hassle. DO NOT BUY. Buy a different brand!
